Shadow Wing::

She looked at him, then to the floor.  Her left wing had fallen off.  
At joint, you could see the metal portion that would be bone, but 
that wasn't mech fluid that was leaking out onto the floor.  It was 
red, deep red, blood red. Instead of wired and metal joints, it was 
muscle and small, extremely tiny fiber wires.

She lowered her front paw down and picked it up.  She looked at the 
wing in her paw.  She then turned her head to look at her shoulder.  
It was red, and the red fluid ran down her back and side. She looked 
at the wing again and then to Veratis, "How...is this..possable? 
And...what does it mean?" her voice was soft and inquisitive. She was 
confused and wanted answers.  She wasn't mad, or had fear, but wanted 
to know how and why?

She looked at the wing in her paw,"With out the wing, I am no longer 
Shadow Wing.  But what am I?"
